import React from 'react'; const NavBar = (props) => { return (
{props.navHeading === "Dashboard" ? "Welcome, Huss Smith" : props.navHeading}
{"0 Planted"}
{"Verified"}
{"Huss Smith"}
); } export default NavBar;
